item.title: Why Even Sharks Avoid Electric Rays
item.description: Despite the size and strength of sharks, electric rays may have one of the most effective defenses in the ocean—electric shocks.

item.title: To Save Sharks, We Need Smarter Fishing Rules
item.description: A new study shows retention bans help, but smarter, more targeted conservation measures are needed.
